taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Eragrostis pectinacea var. miserrima (E. Fourn.) Reeder

bio:treatment.description: Pedicels widely divergent, usually spreading 20-60Â° from the branches. Anthers 0.2-0.4 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Eragrostis pectinacea var. miserrima grows in the southern United States, from Texas to Florida, and south through the lowland tropics to Brazil. It usually flowers from July-November in the Flora region.
